revised_title: Anatomical Study of Marsipobranch Fishes: Myxinoids and Lampreys
tldr: The author examines the skeletal structure and cranio-facial apparatus of myxinoids, specifically Myxine and Bdellostoma, and compares them to the development of lampreys. The study provides insights into the evolution and classification of marsipobranch fishes, highlighting their unique characteristics and similarities to other vertebrates.
